item.title: Careers
item.description: Work for Kovert Do you find it exciting to find security holes in web applications? Or maybe move around in a corporate IT network without being detected? Do you want to work in an environment that puts quality first? Do you want to have dedicated time to study and develop your offensive safety skills? About the position As a penetration tester in Kovert, you are part of a small, inclusive and highly competent team that carries out many different assignments for our customers.

item.title: Our Story
item.description: We find your weaknesses before the hackers do Kovert was founded in January of 2021. We are a remote-first company with 7 employees located all over Norway. Our specialty is security testing, be it web applications, networks, social engineering, hardware testing or physical penetration testing. Our core values are Integrity Research and Development Community Kovert works to deliver quality over quantity, and integrity is in the foundation of our work.
